      • getClosestSystem

        public static ID getClosestSystem(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 position,
                                  SystemContainer systems)
        Returns the closest system that is active
        Parameters:
        position - The position to start from
        systems - The container with positions of all active systems //TODO Find out how to properly document nullable
        Returns:
        ID The ID of the target system (will default to first system returned by getActiveSystems)

      • healFromSystem

        public void healFromSystem(SystemContainer systems,
                           int healRate)
        Heals the auber if they are close a healing system
        Parameters:
        systems - SystemContainer of systems on the station
        healRate - Health to be added to auber

      • damageFromSystem

        public boolean damageFromSystem(SystemContainer systems,
                                float damageRate)
        Damages the auber if they are close to a broken system Used to end the game if the auber's health is <= 0
        Parameters:
        systems -
        damageRate - The damage rate to be inflicted
        Returns:
        true if the health is below 0

      • updateTeleportCoolDown

        Parameters:
        deltaTime - Time passed since last run

                           com.badlogic.gdx.maps.tiled.TiledMapTileLayer room)

        Overrides:
        updatePosition in class Entity
        Parameters:
        deltaTime - The time since last update
        room - The room layer for collision detection
